name: Project Pink Hook(Demo)
description:
This is a early version of my untitled grappling hook game.

Music and sound effects by Pascal Bélisle (https://theoldgamemaker.tumblr.com/)

- Default Controls -
Aim/Walk ......................... Arrow Keys
Jump ............................... Z
Shoot .............................. X
Pause ............................. Escape

Consider downloading the windows executable if the browser version is too slow and/or buggy.
